page.title: 12The Burford Police 1985
page.content: Burford has one Policeman,but can call on four others from Carterton.There is no Police Station.This was closed in 1976.There is a Police House in Frethern Close.Crimes committed are mainly theft,burglary and assault, approximately eighty per year. P.C.Taylor travels by Ford Escort van, by bicycle and on foot(50% of the time).He has no typical day.His time is split into three rotating shifts, 5pm-1am,6am-2pm,9am-5pm.He is on duty for seven days,then a two day break.The night shift is Crime Prevention,the others Enquires and Visits(eg.Schools). He is equipped with two radios U.H.F (range 45 miles),and V.H.F(150 miles). This one is tuned to Kidlington.He phones the Duty Officer at Witney once per hour.40% of crimes are not solved, but are filed at Banbury.His busiest dayis Saturday.
